messages.message: I came across your profile and am very impressed with your background. Congratulations on the success that you have had in your career. We currently have a few new projects in the works that I think your background would be perfect for. I'd love to speak with you about them if you are interested.

I lead the Vaco Technology consulting division in Phoenix and we know a lot of the same people. 
Could I buy you coffee near your office? Iâ€™d love to learn more about your role and be a resource for you in 2017, whether it be with your staffing needs or just to share market intel. 

How does your schedule look March 28th or 30th?
Those dates work for me. Coffee would be really convenient at Village Coffee Roasters on via de Ventura and Hayden if you are in the area.
Perfect! Does 9am work with your schedule?
Sure, want to send a calendar invite?
Yes, what is your email address?
